msbt.message: Well, well! You from around here? Hi, the name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !

Ah, just feels like fate, don't it? Us meetin' here like this.Well, seein' as we're practically family, I'm not gonna let it be the last time we see each other.Like I said, I'm in sales. When we're ready to deal, I'll set you up with the family discount. You'll love it.

So what's this I've been hearing about there being some grand museum around here?'Cause I got a warehouse full of art I'm settin' up to liquidate, and I'm gonna wanna pass those savings on.Hey, if you know anything about it, keep me in mind! I'll be sure to cut you in on the family discount.

Hey, I hope you don't mind me bein' forward, but you look to me like someone who's got an eye for art.Don't be shocked. I've got a keen instinct for these things.And speakin' of instinct, I just had this feelingso I brought with me!

Yeah, I know! What a crazy coincidence! It's like fate!Well, I wanna sell to you, and ONLY you, 'cause you're family, and you're gonna get a giveaway price.How does 498,000 Bells grab ya? It's a bargain. Whaddaya say?
I-I say no!
Wha?!

Come on, now! You're never gonna find a better price thanAh, but that was fate talkin', right? Reminding me you're familyI mean, you're practically my cousin!So here's what I'm gonna do. I'm gonna give you my family-exclusive, patent-pending Cousin's Discount.For only , you'll be the proud owner of your very own .
Sold!
That's crazy. No.
Ha! You are NOT gonna regret this. I'll just take those Bells from you
I knew you had an eye for art. It's like it was meant to be. I hope we can do this again, cousin!

Crazy like a Well, you know.Look, a deal like this may never come around again. Are you sure you wanna risk that?They're your Bells. I respect that. Think it over and come back when you change your mind.
Like I was saying—it's fate! Let's Now wait a minute. You don't have enough Bells, cousin!Look, a deal like this may never come around again. Come back when you're ready to take this seriously.

Like I was saying—it's fate! Let's Now wait a minute. You don't have any room in your pockets, cousin!Look, a bargain like this may never come around again. Go clear some space so we can seal the deal!
Well, if it isn't ! Great to see you again!
Hey, ! I knew you couldn't stay away from a deal!
So with the Cousin's Discount, it's to claim your very own . Deal?
Sold!
I'll pass.
Whaaa?! You are missin' out! I stand by this deal, cousin. You're not gonna find a better price!But they're your Bells, and you've got your preferences, and there'll be other deals. Count on that.

But, uhthis is embarrassin' Someone's already bought .Look, I'm so sorry! I tried to hold on to it for you, but they begged and begged and What could I say?I warned you it was a hot deal. Well, there'll be others. You can count on that, cousin!
We meet again, !It's nice to be someplace where art is loved and appreciatedIt's too hard to find others who can enjoy all the beautiful art pieces out there, y'know? Ha! Of course you do.
Ah, it's a real pleasure seein' you again, !I didn't realize how much I'd miss talkin' to someone who truly gets art, and can spot a good deal besides!
Well, if it isn't ! How can I help ya?
One art, please!
Just saying hello.
Oh? Well, hello to you too, cousin! Nice weather for a stroll, isn't it? See you around!

Ha ha ha! Straight to business. I like it.Lucky you. I happen to have
right here!Don't ask how I got it. Long story. But it's got "you" written all over it. Metaphorically, that is.Now, judging from your expression, you're either eager to buy, or you've got some déjà vu goin'. Maybe both.
I'm gonna go with the former and tell you it's a steal at . So whaddaya say? We got a deal?
Deal!
I'll pass...
Huh? Are you absolutely sure?Masterpieces like this don't come around often, especially at such a bargain price. But they're your Bells.
Great decision! You saw a deal you knew you'd NEVER see again, and you jumped on it. Well done, cousin!You're really gonna enjoy your . I just know it!
Y'know, there's just somethin' about this island Everyone's so nice and trusting and generous. It's great!
Hmm I got a real good deal on an old fishing trawler a while back. I bet it'd make a good showroom.
Young or old, it doesn't matter. Art speaks to everyone. And so, I think, does gettin' a good deal on it!
Correct me if I'm wrong, but you're not from around here, are you?<10_4 /> What a coincidence! Me neither!It's a shame I don't have anything to sell you. But don't you worry. I'll make it up to you!
So are you here sightseeing? The feel of this place is wonderful. It's like a work of artand I'd know!

Usually, this is when I would pitch an amazing deal your way, butI don't have anythin' to sell ya right now.No excuses. Next time I'm in your neck of the water, you're gonna get a deal like you've never seen!
You been to the museum here yet? If not, then I gotta tell ya, it is truly a sight to seefrom the outside. I actually haven't been inside yet. Too many customers. You know how it is.

Well, well! You from around here? Hi, the name's Redd. I work in sales. And you are<10_4 /> !What a great name! Intelligent. Strong. I can already tell we're gonna be pals. No, not palsfamily! It's a pleasure to meet ya, !Hey, would you mind if I ran an idea by you?
I'd know that shining face anywhere. How ya been, ?You made the right choice buyin' that art from me earlier. I've had a lot of folks asking about it.
Well, if it isn't ! Long time no see!
Ahyou know, I really gotta be honest. I think I'm fallin' for .I mean, you've got quite a setup goin' here. And a LOT of art fans
! Just who I wanted to see. OK, I've been thinkin'

So wants art, and I got art to sell. Might be something to this.But I couldn't sell to just anybody. I'd need someone I could trust. Completely. As if they were familyAnd since we're basically cousins And because I know you've got an eye for quality I want it to be you!Wanna look at a few things? I've got both art and furniture, plus you'd get my Cousin's Discount. You in?
I'm in!
Seems kinda sketchy...
I knew I could count on you, cousin! That is absolutely the right choice.
I'm hurt! There's nothing sketchy about this. I can prove it.
I've got my boat anchored off the northern shore, and I'm almost done fixing all the leaks. Long story.Come have a look at what I'm sellin'. You won't regret it!
So I was Oh, hang on. You've got company right now. It can wait.Come chat once we have a little more privacy, alright?
Hey, I wanna get you in on the ground floor of an idea of mine. Could be big!I don't want to steal you from your company though. We can chat once we have a little more privacy, OK?
Correct me if I'm wrong, but you're not from around here, are you?<10_4 /> What a coincidence! Me neither!It's a shame I don't have anything to sell you. But don't you worry. I'll make it up to you!
So are you here sightseeing? The feel of this place is wonderful. It's like a work of artand I'd know!

Usually, this is when I would pitch an amazing deal your way, butI don't have anythin' to sell ya right now.No excuses. Next time I've got somethin' I can sell ya, you'll get a deal like you've never seen!
You been to the museum here yet? If not, then I gotta tell ya, it is truly a sight to seefrom the outside. I actually haven't been inside yet. Too many customers. You know how it is.
